site_name: 118-122 King's Road and 7-9 Tryon Street, LONDON, SW3
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 15 (Noise survey and report) of planning permission PP/22/02161 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/21/02928 (Demolition of existing above ground buildings and structures at 118 -122 King's Road, including the King's Walk Shopping Mall and 7 - 9 Tryon Street and replacement with a five storey building (ground, plus three upper floors and a set-back roof) with retention and refurbishment of existing basement and lower ground levels and rear ground floor area to provide retail (Class A1 and / or A3), office (Class B1) and non-residential institution/leisure (Class D1/ D2) uses, the creation of a new shared surface 2 on Tryon Street, and associated parking, landscaping and public realm improvements). The variation seeks minor alterations to the massing and other minor associated design changes.)
